DOC.brief_summary: OPC-1085EL ophthalmic solution, carteolol long-acting ophthalmic solution or latanoprost ophthalmic solution are administered once daily for 7 days and the effect on the blood concentration of carteolol and latanoprost in OPC-1085EL ophthalmic solution by formulating the combination drug will be determined.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study of OPC-1085EL Ophthalmic Solution in Healthy Male Adult Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Subjects who are considered medically healthy per investigator's judgment Subjects with ocular conditions as defined by the protocol Subjects with intraocular pressure: <10 or â‰¥22 mmHg
